name: Crappy Grabber
description:
You are caught on an island. Together with another person and only one roll of toilet paper! 

So you have to protect it. Run away from your follower (which might was a friend in past) and be aware of the ocean!

.... OH and coconuts are not your friends!

---------------------------------

Why toilet paper?

Because I'm not able to buy a single pack of toilet paper anymore. It is more likely to catch up a role on an island than buying on in our super markets. So the game is meant to be satirical.

---------------------------------

Misc

This game is a side-project. If you have good ideas and I have some time then I might will implement them :-). 

Please let me know what you like and what could be improved.

To make it a little bit more challenging here are some ideas I already have in mind:

  • Sound
  • Change Speed of follower (to make game easier or harder)
  • Adding some collectables 
  • Animate the ocean
